Description: Active: Blink - Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.  If damage is taken from an enemy hero, Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds.
Lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.
The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.
A medium weave of metal chains.
A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.
The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

Description: Passive: Pierce - Grants a chance to deal bonus damage.
Lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.
A hammer forged of pure mithril.
Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.
A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

Description:
Active: Destroy Tree - Destroy a target tree.
Passive: Quell - Gives bonus attack damage against non-hero units, depending on the type of hero you are.
Lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.
A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.
Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.
Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.
A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.
A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.
A valued accessory for improving vitality.
A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.
This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.
An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.
You grow stronger just by holding it.
A long blade imbued with time magic.
A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.
A mystical orb containing the essence of life.
A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

Description:
Passive: Lifesteal - Gives lifesteal on attacks.

Morbid Mask is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
Lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.
This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.
A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

Description: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Lore: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.

Description: Passive: True Sight - Gives the ability to see invisible units and wards. Drops on death.
Multiple instances of spell resistance from items do not stack.
Lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.
A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

Description: Use: Instantly restores health and mana.
Lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.

Description: Active: Energy Charge - Gains charges (max 10) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area.  When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.
Lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

Description: Active: Energy Charge - Gains charges (max 15) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area.  When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.
Lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

Components.Lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

Components.Lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

Description: Active: Ghost Form - Enter ghost form, unable to attack or be attacked, but take 40% extra magic damage. Using a Teleport Scroll or Boots of Travel dispels Ghost Form.
Lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

Description: Use: Restores mana over time.  If the user is attacked, the effect is lost.
Lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

Description: Use: Regenerate - Restores HP over time.  If the user is attacked, the effect is lost.
Lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

Description: Use: Reveal - Reveals invisible Heroes in a nearby area.

Use:  Regenerate - Restores HP and Mana over time. Effect is lost if unit is attacked. Empty Bottle refills near town fountain.  You can also store runes in the bottle, to save for later use.  After 2 minutes, stored Runes will be activated.
Lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.

Description:
Use: Places an Observer Ward to give sight of the surrounding area.

Lasts 6 minutes.

Use: Places a Sentry Ward to give True Sight of the surrounding area.

Lasts 3 minutes.
Use: Eat Tree - Consume a tree to restore HP over time. Comes with 3 charges.
Lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

Description: Creature that carries items to and from your base.
Lore: Losing the donkey is punishable by death.

Description: Use: Teleport - Teleports you to a target friendly building.

Active: Teleport - Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.

Components.Description: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Components.Lore: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.

Description:
Active: Phase - Gives increased movement speed and lets you move through units. Phase is cancelled upon using another item or ability.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.

Components.Description: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

Lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.
Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.
A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.
An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.
A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.
A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.
Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.
Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.
This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.
A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.
A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

Description:
Active: Switch Attribute - Changes selected attribute between Strength, Agility and Intelligence.

Lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

Components.Lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

Description: Passive: Damage Block - Blocks physical attack damage, depending on the type of hero you are.  Poor Man's Shield will always block attacks from enemy Heroes, but has a chance to block damage from creeps.
Lore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.

Lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

Description:
Active: Restore - Heals 250 HP and gives +2 armor in an area.
Passive: Mekansm Aura - Bonus HP Regen in an area.

Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.
Lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

Description:
Passive: Vladmir's Aura - Grants a variety of bonuses to nearby allies. Lifesteal bonuses from Vladmir's Aura only affect melee units.

Multiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack.
Lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

Components.Lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

Description: Fast flying creature that carries items to and from your base.  Requires Animal Courier.
Active: Armor Bonus - Gives +2 to all nearby allied units.  Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.
Lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

Components.Lore: A medium weave of metal chains.

Description:
Passive: Basilius Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 AoE.
Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.

Multiple instances of Basilius Aura do not stack.

Components.Lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

Active: Barrier - Gives nearby friendly units a shield that blocks 400 spell damage.

Multiple instances of spell resistance from items do not stack.
Lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

Description:
Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.
Active: Soul Release - Heals HP over time for friendly units, but deals damage over time for enemy units. The healing effect is lost if the affected unit takes damage from an enemy hero or tower.
Lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.

Components.Lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

Components.Lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

Lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

Description: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Necronomicon Warrior and a Necronomicon Archer to fight for you.  Their strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon increases in level.  Lasts 35 seconds.
Lore: Considered the holy grail of necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

Components.Lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

Description:
Passive: Assault Aura - Grants attack speed and armor to nearby allied units, and decreases armor for nearby enemies.

Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.
Lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

Components.Lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.
A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

Description:
Passive: Health Regeneration - Restores a percentage of max health per second.

This ability is disabled if damage is taken from an enemy Hero or Roshan within the last 4 seconds if your hero is melee or 6 seconds if your hero is ranged.
Lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

Components.Lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.
A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

Description: Active: Avatar - Grants magic immunity.  Duration and cooldown decrease with each use.  Some Ultimate abilities are able to disable through Black King Bar.
Lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

Components.Lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.
A hammer forged of pure mithril.

Description: Passive: Reincarnation - Brings you to life with full health and mana 5.0 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. Reincarnation must be used within 6 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears.
Lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.

Description:
Active: Arctic Blast - Emits a freezing wave that does 200 damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4.0 seconds.
Passive: Freezing Aura - Reduces attack speed on enemies.

Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
Lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

Components.Lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.
Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

Description: Passive: Bloodpact - Starts with 6 charges. Gains 1 charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1675 range. Each charge bestows 1 mana regeneration per second, reduces gold lost from death by 25, and reduces respawn time by 4 seconds. When the bearer dies, restores 400 HP + 30 HP per charge to allied units within 1675 units, then loses a third of its charges. While dead, the bearer continues to receive experience at the death location and gives 1800 unit vision there.
Lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

Components.Lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.
A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.
Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

Description: Passive: Spellblock - Blocks most targeted spells once every 20 seconds.
Lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.
